name: part_011
file: tmp_【#ちょこ先生誕2021】ちょこ先生の3Dお誕生日会【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [p9k8A3XzH68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Choco-sensei talks to the audience about her birthday goods and introduces the final song.
Choco-sensei performs the song 'Kimidori ni Somaru'.
Closing MC and outro, announcing a collab song cover with Mel.

subtitles.original: もう一曲だけ歌っていい？チョコ。
subtitles.english: Can Choco sing just one more song?

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇねぇねぇ、もう一曲だけ歌っていい？
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey, hey, can I sing just one more song?

subtitles.original: 最近チョコがハマってる曲歌ってもいい？
subtitles.english: Can I sing a song that Choco's been into lately?

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、そう、全部セットの方は期間限定なのでね、ぜひぜひ
subtitles.english: Yes! So, the full set is available for a limited time only, so please...

subtitles.original: 販売中に、販売期間に、ぜひぜひ全部セットお求めいただけたらと思います。
subtitles.english: I hope you'll consider getting the full set during the sale period.

subtitles.original: 耳なめボイスはね、全部セットにしかついてこないで、期間限定なんでよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: The ear-licking voice is only in the full set and is for a limited time, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: ということで！
subtitles.english: And so!

subtitles.original: それでは、最後の歌、歌っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Now, I'm going to sing the final song!

subtitles.original:
君色に染まる
作詞/作曲:TOKOTOKO(西沢さんP)
subtitles.english:
Dyed in Your Color
Lyrics/Music: TOKOTOKO (Nishizawa-san P)

subtitles.original: 期待してすぐに諦めて
subtitles.english: Expect, then immediately give up

subtitles.original: 曖昧な答えに流されては
subtitles.english: Washed away by vague answers

subtitles.original: 自分だけ置いていかれるような
subtitles.english: Feeling like I'm the only one left behind

subtitles.original: そんなイメージが胸を突つく夜だ
subtitles.english: It's a night where such images prick at my heart

subtitles.original: 覚えてるような
subtitles.english: Like I remember

subtitles.original: 覚えていないような
subtitles.english: Like I don't remember

subtitles.original: 憧れと記憶を彷徨うよ
subtitles.english: Wandering between yearnings and memories

subtitles.original: 僕は君のために
subtitles.english: I for you

subtitles.original: 君は僕のために
subtitles.english: You for me

subtitles.original: 生まれたなら ちょっと嬉しいね
subtitles.english: If we were born for each other, I'd be a little happy

subtitles.original: 気づいたら君色に染まってるような
subtitles.english: By the time I realized it, I was dyed in your color

subtitles.original: 何気ない言葉で汚してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to stain me with casual words

subtitles.original: ずっと わからないふりを続けてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've kept pretending not to know all along

subtitles.original: この時が来るまで
subtitles.english: Until this moment comes

subtitles.original: もしかして君と釣り合ってないかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'm not a good match for you?

subtitles.original: そんな不安もたまに過ぎるけれど
subtitles.english: Such anxieties occasionally cross my mind, but

subtitles.original: いつも 困らせてばかりでごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry for always causing you trouble

subtitles.original: 好きだよ 好きだよ 好きだよって伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you "I love you, I love you, I love you"

subtitles.original: 傷つかないように言葉を探しても
subtitles.english: Even if I search for words so as not to get hurt

subtitles.original: 空回り 気持ちだけ急かされて
subtitles.english: Going in circles, only my feelings are being rushed

subtitles.original: ねぇ 間違ってるような
subtitles.english: Hey, it feels like it's wrong

subtitles.original: これで合ってるような
subtitles.english: It feels like this is right

subtitles.original: 二人の答え ずっと よろしくね
subtitles.english: Our answer, please keep it this way forever

subtitles.original: 気づいたら君色に染まってるような
subtitles.english: By the time I realized it, I was dyed in your color

subtitles.original: 何気ない言葉で汚してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to stain me with casual words

subtitles.original: ずっと わからないふりを続けてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've kept pretending not to know all along

subtitles.original: この時が来るまで
subtitles.english: Until this moment comes

subtitles.original: もしかして君と釣り合ってないかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'm not a good match for you?

subtitles.original: そんな不安もたまに過ぎるけれど
subtitles.english: Such anxieties occasionally cross my mind, but

subtitles.original: いつも 困らせてばかりでごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry for always causing you trouble

subtitles.original: 好きだよ 好きだよ 好きだよって伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you "I love you, I love you, I love you"

subtitles.original: 好きだよ 好きだよ 好きだよって伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you "I love you, I love you, I love you"

subtitles.original: 好きだよ 好きだよ 好きだよって伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you "I love you, I love you, I love you"

subtitles.original: はぁ！メルさんとの歌ってみた、この後プレミア公開なので、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Phew! My song cover with Mel-san will premiere after this, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: またねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original:
重大発表もあるわよ
お誕生日3D配信
subtitles.english:
There's also a major announcement
Birthday 3D Stream
